name: Texas Holdem - Dinger Poker
description:
DESCRIPTION

Easy and simple to enjoy poker games. Dinger Poker! Enjoy No limit Texas Holdem Poker!
You can enjoy the poker game with real players.
You will be able to feel the fun of friends and enjoyed playing poker.

Features:
* Dinger Poker is free to play.
* You can play anytime, anywhere.
* Many of real players are online.
* Dinger Poker needs a simple control, even you can play one hand.
* You can get free chips everyday up to 1,000,000!
* Invite your friends and enjoying chat, gift, and playing.
* You can play with facebook friend too.
See you at the tables!


This game is only available to people of legal age.
The game offers no possibility of winning money or anything of value.
Success in playing this game does not imply your success in a similar real-money casino game.
